Text:
I'm ready to hear the "letter" the judge requested from the DOJ. "3 pages, single spaced, no less with specific reference to the President's statement.
Thanx, Annoyme, for getting the word out so quickly.

LOL!! I'd love to hear/read that letter as well! Should prove interesting (to say the least! I'll bet the legal obamabots in the WH just about had fits trying to come up with the required 'home work' and parsed every word 20 times! LMAO!!

Annoyme - as always - thank you for today's podcast! :) Much appreciated!

http://www.foxnews.com/interactive/politics/2012/04/05/justice-department-letter-to-5th-circuit-court-appeals/

Here's the document in question - and it works out to 2 full pages plus about 1/3 of page three.

Waffles aren't just for breakfast anymore - it's a WH/DOJ menu staple!!
Holder should teach a class... in how not to respect the history of U.S. law and judicial oversight.

Thank you as always.
You're posting these means a lot to those of us living on the far side of things.
As to your "teach a class" comment - this entire regime experience has, I HOP, taut the U.S.A. a needed lesson about what is right and what is wrong.

And yes, in spite of all I've seen, I am still an optimist.

Albeit, a very well armed optimist.
